JOB DESCRIPTION:
Extensive experience in ASP.NET3.5 & above,  C#,  VB.Net,  Entity Framework,  SQL Server 2008

Experience in Jquery,  Jquery Ajax Get/ Post,  Javascript,  RDLC

Strong experience of developing applications with OOAD (Object- Oriented Analysis & Design) concepts

Should have knowledge of Web Services,  Web API,  Windows Form,  WCF

Experience in ERP & Payment Gateways would be a competitive edge

Execute full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) or Application Development Life Cycle.

Develop flowcharts,  layouts and documentation to identify requirements and solutions

Write well- designed,  testable code

Produce specifications and determine operational feasibility

Integrate software components into a fully functional software system

Document and maintain software functionality

Troubleshoot,  debug and upgrade existing systems

Deploy programs and evaluate user feedback

Comply with project plans and industry standards

Ensure software is updated with latest features

Collaborate with other programmers to design and implement features.

Work independently when required.

Continuously learn and improve skills.
